reviewText: I now know why this dvd was so cheap- it is a compilation of fans and paparazzi talking ABOUT One Direction... There is no actual direct access/interviews with the boy band. I wouldn't recommend, it's a waste of money and time.
It was all just interviews of other people. We did not like it at all. We thought it was going to be a movie or more on their life.
I originally bought this for my niece, and after watching it with her I had to get one for myself! These young men are truly talented and driven. Everyone should see this, it is very inspiring!

Anyone who wants to learn about how and why "One Direction" was able to rise to fame so quickly should check out this documentary. Music biz insiders are interviewed and they explain how "One Direction" became a phenomenon almost over night. A very interesting doc!
This film really made me feel closer to the band, I learned  lot about how the group got to where they are today. Awesome interviews with the band make the purchase more than worth it. Awesome movie!
They are so cute and so talented. And what I've learned from this documentary is, it wasn't by chance that they got this huge.  Talented yes, but so much more. Great film for all One Direction fans.
I am going to give this to my granddaughters as a gift- they idolize One Direction!! It was reasonable priced,
Good movie!
love
Meh!!
I'm not a professional, but my cousin was so excited to get it, so everything must be okay (:
My cousin's 5 year old LOVED this!!!
LIKED IT
My teenage granddaughters love it
Not what I expected.  It's just a bunch of fan interviews and no concert coverage.  My daughter did not like it.
My daughter loved it
excellent
Arrived quickly and product exactly as described. Gift for my daughter at Christmas, she loves all that one direction crap
Apparently very popular  with granddaughters
My daughter loved it and that's what is important.
They didn't spend a lot of time talking to the members directly, I didn't even finish it.
Could not find music and only very little of the boys actually talking. Lots of golddiggers blabbing on and on.
Good Documentary
Let my students watch this as a reward.  They are 1D groupies (is that used anymore).  THEY LOVED IT.
just boring documentary of other 'people' talking about how One Direction became famous.
This is not my speed, but my 13-year-old granddaughter had a huge smile on her face as she watched it.  She thought it was wonderful.
Nothing new - basically another documentary.
